name: Tartarus Sequence: The Backrooms
description:
Developed as a challenge to make a small game within a week, the Tartarus Sequence: The Backrooms is a short horror game set in the year 1997. Who are you, where are you, and why are you there? Only the Dr. knows.

Install instructions

(Windows)

  1. Download the game
  2. Right click the zip file and "extract all"
  3. If needed, head to Engine\Extras\Redist and install the prerequisites.
  4. Run the game by then double clicking BackroomGame.exe
